modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: To correct the above HTML, I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> tag to specify the primary language of the document. This improves accessibility by helping screen readers and other assistive technologies provide the correct language context to users.

- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">
